snippet: Harrington, 43, a three-time major winner ranked 297th entering the tournament, topped Berger, 21, on Monday on the second playoff hole at the P.G.A. National Champion course.
abstract: Padraig Harrington, ranked 297th on PGA Tour coming into the Honda Classic, beats Daniel Berger on second hole playoff for the win, Harrington's first Tour victory since 2008.
lead_paragraph: Harrington, 43, a three-time major winner ranked 297th entering the tournament, topped Berger, 21, on Monday on the second playoff hole at the P.G.A. National Champion course.

headline.print_headline: Harrington, 43, Beats the Yips and, in a Playoff, a Rival Half His Age
headline.seo: Padraig Harrington Beats Daniel Berger in Honda Classic Playoff
headline.main: Harrington, 43, Beats the Yips and, in a Playoff, a Rival Half His Age
